name: Break It! - Fun of Destruction
description:
Get superpowers and destroy the whole level!
(Note that ball jumps automatically)

* * *
Jump to the top, gain superpowers, and break all the platforms! How many levels can you break?

Game features:
• Very simple controls.
• Classic mobile casual platformer mechanics.
• Breath taking experience of dodging flying spikes.
• Flexible gameplay where you choose your own pace.
• Destroy all the obstacles that were bothering you on your way to the top.
• Integrated Zapic, an amazing social gaming platform which allows you to challenge your friends!

How to play:
1. Use your finger to move the ball horizontally (left & right)
2. Climb on the platforms, reach the top of the level and get superpower!
3. Control the ball on it’s way down and use it to destroy the whole level.
4. Break as many levels as you can.
5. Challenge your friends using Zapic!

How to get the highest score:
On your way down destroy as many platforms as possible.

Does this game have an ending?
No, “Break It!” is an endless arcade which means you can get an infinite number of funny memories, adrenaline moments and positive emotions!
